ygData.subject: Re: Re: Lots o Wizard groups
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/12/99 12:51:17 PM Eastern Daylight Time, tperkins@186k.net writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/12/99 12:51:17 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
tperkins@... writes:

<< I think the key to pulling in that particular situation is to just pull and
sort out one individual mob and clear them all out rather than to try to
just pull that knight out by himself. >>


Yes, lots of times you have to knock them all down, 1 by 1, and can't choose
the order in which they choose to linger over your feigned body. Eventually
you will get the mob you're after, though. when i pull the Ghoul Lord or the
Live King in lower guk, very rarely is the target mob the last one to return
to his spot. In those situations, you just grab the last one to linger, and
eventually you'll get the one you want.
